com.rexsl.core

Class XsltFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rexsl.core.XsltFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    @Loggable(value=1)
public final class XsltFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    Converts XML to XHTML, if necessary.

    You don't need to instantiate this class directly. It is instantiated by servlet container according to configuration from web.xml. Should be used in web.xml (together with RestfulServlet) like this: 

     <filter>
  <filter-name>XsltFilter</filter-name>
  <filter-class>com.rexsl.core.XsltFilter</filter-class>
 </filter>
 <filter-mapping>
  <filter-name>XsltFilter</filter-name>
  <servlet-name>RestfulServlet</servlet-name>
  <dispatcher>REQUEST</dispatcher>
  <dispatcher>ERROR</dispatcher>
 </filter-mapping>
